data.title: Construction of the Literature Graph in Semantic Scholar
data.abstract: We describe a deployed scalable system for organizing published scientific literature into a heterogeneous graph to facilitate algorithmic manipulation and discovery.

publicationVenue.name: International Conference on Software Engineering
alternate_names: IEEE International Conference on Semiconductor Electronics
